thread.title: 'I'd love to see a shutdown' if no immigration law: Trump

title: 'I'd love to see a shutdown' if no immigration law: Trump
text:
'I'd love to see a shutdown' if no immigration law: Trump Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 01:01 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he would welcome a federal government shutdown if Congress is not able to agree to changes in immigration law that he said would prevent criminals from entering the country. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
